name: Handle Champ
overview:
Handle Champ (ハンドルチャンプ Handoru Chanpu?) is an arcade Bishi Bashi game released on 1998 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami.
Handle Champ is a racing game where cars are fueled by "Cola" instead of petrol and drive around normal and not so normal tracks.

Players compete head to head on the one cabinet. Controls is attained with the steering wheel and accelerator pedal.

Normal tracks include your typical grand prix circuits. Unusual tracks include a bowling alley, where players actually drive their cars down bowling alleys.
